disconnect.title: Disconnect WhatsApp
disconnect.description: This will disconnect your WhatsApp session. You will need to scan the QR code again to reconnect.

resetEverything.title: Reset Everything
resetEverything.description: This action will reset all WhatsApp connections, messages, and settings. This cannot be undone.
resetEverything.confirmationError: Please type 'RESET EVERYTHING' exactly to confirm
